item.title: U.S. Government and Foundations Announce New Public-Private Effort to Unlock Finance to Accelerate the Energy Transition
item.description: U.S. DEPARTMENT OF STATE For Immediate Release MEDIA NOTE November 9, 2022 U.S. Government and Foundations Announce New Public-Private Effort to Unlock Finance to Accelerate the Energy Transition U.S. Special Presidential Envoy for Climate John Kerry, The Rockefeller Foundation, and the Bezos Earth Fund announced a partnership today to work toward the creation of an Energy Transition Accelerator (ETA) intended to catalyze private capital to accelerate the clean energy transition in developing countries.
